resources.string: Welcome to game Guess4num! I\'m niasw (Sun Smallwhite).

Please guess a 4 digits number. (may begin with 0)
 'A' represents for number of digits match perfectly,
 'B' represents for number of digits match, but at wrong location.
 If more than 1 digit matches the same digit you gave, digits won't be counted twice.
 If more than 1 location matches the same digit you gave, locations won't be counted twice.
 This old game was on my WenQu Star around 10 years ago, and I carry it here to show my respect to the pioneer that time.
 Theoretically, you can win the game by only guessing 8 times. Have fun ~
